description.baseScoring: Points are awarded for each correct pick based on the round.
description.underdogPoints: Additional points are awarded for correctly picking upsets. The bonus is calculated from how much of an upset it was and in what round it was. The exact formula is: (winner seed - lower seed) Ã— seed factor for that round.
description.tiebreaker: In case of a tie, the participant who correctly picked more games in later rounds wins.
description.starBonus: Star bonuses are small bonuses given based on some characteristic of your submitted bracket. They work the exact same as last year a small change to the way they are scored. There will be bonuses awarded each round and there is a separate prize for the person who won the most start bonuses. Include jayhawk in your submission email. The amount of points a star bonus contributes is determined based on the number of people that won it
